contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Notability|date=November 2011}} {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''''The Radiation Belt and Magnetosphere''''' is a [[book]] written by [[Wilmot N. Hess|Wilmot Hess]] in 1968. The intention of the book is to [[wikt:amalgamate|amalgamate]] and sift through some 2500 articles, written since 1960, on this topic. ==See also== *[[Magnetosphere]] *[[Van Allen radiation belt]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Radiation Belt And Magnetosphere}} [[Category:1968 books]] [[Category:Physics books]] {{physics-book-stub}}
